bug.author: blackCmd
bug.summary: When I tried Asynchronous interface, AttributeError: 'RPNHead' object has no attribute 'rpn_head'
bug.description:
When I tried Asynchronous interface in documentation I got an error like this.
AttributeError: 'RPNHead' object has no attribute 'rpn_head'
And this is the documentation link.
https://mmdetection.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html#asynchronous-interface-supported-for-python-3-7
My python version is 3.7.5. How can I use Asynchronous interface? Plz help for solving the error.

comments.comment: RPNHead shouldn't have rpn_head I guess, it points self sleep_interval = self.rpn_head.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) -> sleep_interval = self.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) does it work?

RPNHead shouldn't have rpn_head I guess, it points self sleep_interval = self.rpn_head.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) -> sleep_interval = self.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) does it work?
RPNHead shouldn't have rpn_head I guess, it points self sleep_interval = self.rpn_head.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) -> sleep_interval = self.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) does it work?
Oh, plz wait. I'm gonna try it now! It makes another error like this.
Hmm.. Where can I get rpn_head module.

could you try to modify
mmdetection/mmdet/models/roi_heads/base_roi_head.py
Line 86 in d613f21
async def async_simple_test(self, x, img_meta, **kwargs):
as async def async_simple_test(self, x, proposal_list , img_meta, **kwargs):

Line 86 in d613f21

as async def async_simple_test(self, x, proposal_list , img_meta, **kwargs):
I thank you for your kindness bro. But I don't have a time to try it now... Sorry...ㅠ_ㅠ I will do that in 24h ! And I'll reply as soon as possible.

same issue in pytest tests/test_async.py could be solved in this way
RPNHead shouldn't have rpn_head I guess, it points self sleep_interval = self.rpn_head.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) -> sleep_interval = self.test_cfg.pop('async_sleep_interval', 0.025) does it work?

could you try to modify

as async def async_simple_test(self, x, proposal_list , img_meta, **kwargs):

mmdetection/mmdet/models/roi_heads/base_roi_head.py
Lines 86 to 88 in d613f21
async def async_simple_test(self, x, img_meta, **kwargs):
"""Asynchronized test function."""
raise NotImplementedError

it's implemented in the standard roi head
